rules.natural: If the government supports the legislation, then society's operations are lawful.
Provided that the government approves the amendment, society's operations are lawful.
Whenever the organization appeals the ruling, the appeal is dismissed by the court.
Under the condition that the organization appeals the ruling, the organization files a motion.
Either the organization appeals the ruling or the government approves the amendment.
Whenever the organization files a motion, the motion is granted by the court.
Provided that the motion is granted by the court, the appeal is not dismissed by the court.
Either the organization complies with the regulation or the organization is fined by the agency.
Under the condition that the organization is fined by the agency, society's operations are lawful.
Provided that the agency initiates enforcement, the agency arrests members.
If the agency initiates enforcement, then the agency executes the warrant.
Under the condition that the agency seizes assets, the organization's operations are shutdown.
If the legislation enacts prohibition, then the government supports the legislation.
Provided that the agency arrests members, the agency seizes assets.
Either the media criticizes the agency or it is not the case that the public supports enforcement.
If the media publishes a report, then the media exposes corruption.
Provided that the journalist investigates the agency, the journalist verifies evidence.
If the journalist verifies evidence, then, should the media expose corruption, the media does not criticize the agency.
Whenever the opposition challenges the law, then, if it is not the case that the legislation enacts prohibition, the legislation is not repealed by the government.
If the opposition gathers support, then the campaign is successful for the opposition.
If the violation is detected through monitoring, then, if the organization violates the ban, the organization violates the law.
Provided that the citizen reports activity, the violation is detected through monitoring.
Either the citizen reports activity or the system detects activity.
Either the agency ignores the report or, if the system detects activity, the violation is detected through monitoring.
If the agency investigates the organization, then, under the condition that it is not the case that the legislation enacts prohibition, the organization violates the law.
Either the organization avoids detection or either the agency raids the premises or, if the organization sells alcohol, alcohol is an illegal substance.
Provided that the organization operates secretly, it is not the case that the organization avoids detection.
If the organization bribes officials, then the organization does not avoid detection.
Either the operation is discovered by the authorities or either the organization operates secretly or the organization bribes officials.
If the lawyer argues the appeal, then, under the condition that the organization appeals the ruling, the ruling is overturned by the court.
Provided that the agency confiscates alcohol, the organization's operations are shutdown.
Whenever the agency executes the warrant, the agency enters the premises.
If the judge authorizes the warrant, then, if the agency enters the premises, the agency confiscates alcohol.
Either the judge authorizes the warrant or the supervisor approves the action.
If the supervisor approves the action, then, under the condition that the agency enters the premises, the agency confiscates alcohol.
Whenever the agency defends its actions, then, if the media publishes a report, the media does not criticize the agency.
If the agency justifies its methods, then, should the media publish a report, the media does not criticize the agency.
Provided that the agency responds to criticism, either the agency defends its actions or the agency justifies its methods.
Either the agency responds to criticism or the agency ignores criticism.
If the agency ignores criticism, then either the agency defends its actions or the agency justifies its methods.
Under the condition that the agency obtains a warrant, the agency raids the premises.
Either the agency obtains a warrant or the agency conducts surveillance on the organization.
If the agency conducts surveillance on the organization, then, whenever the organization sells alcohol, alcohol is an illegal substance.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if the organization complies with the regulation then society's operations are lawful, the agency initiates enforcement.
Should it be not the case that if the organization complies with the regulation then society's operations are lawful, it is not the case that the organization's operations are shutdown.
If it is not the case that if the agency acts promptly then it is not the case that the agency ignores the report, then the response is delayed by the agency.
Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that the opposition challenges the law then it is not the case that the opposition proposes an alternative, the opposition gathers support.
If it is not the case that if it is not the case that society's operations are lawful then it is not the case that the public protests the regulation, then the public supports enforcement.
If it is not the case that the legislation enacts prohibition, then the legislation is repealed by the government.
Whenever it is not the case that the legislation enacts prohibition, the organization violates the ban.
If it is not the case that the opposition challenges the law, then the opposition proposes an alternative.
Whenever it is not the case that society's operations are lawful, the public protests the regulation.
If it is not the case that society's operations are lawful, then the organization sells alcohol.
